item.title: On the southern highway verge, an overgrown Elderberry Bush/Tree, requires reduction and removal of tree waste., 16th July
item.description:
Next to highway street light No3, on the westbound pavement of Cantors Drive, an overgrown shrub/Tree, around 5mx3mx5m, requires reduction and tree waste removal. (Also, a dog bin is situated here.)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cantors Drive, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
